title: A LoL error.
body:
Good moring my friends.I opened my pc and i just wanted to play some LoL.I runned the launcher and when i pressed launch the application showed me a message saying that the D:/Riot Games/League of Legends/libnghttp2.dll either is not made for the Windows run or it has an error.....
Soo please if you know how to fix that it would be appriciate to help me by writing in the comments the way.Thank you.

replies.body: Good morning!  Sucks to hear about this hiccup and hope it hasn't taken too much out of your day!  I've seen this issue before, and it can be a combination of bad game files and security settings preventing game files from being accessed.  I suggest going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform the clean reinstall!  Let me know if you have any questions!

Good moring my friends.I opened my pc and i just wanted to play some LoL.I runned the launcher and when i pressed launch the application showed me a message saying that the D:/Riot Games/League of Legends/libnghttp2.dll either is not made for the Windows run or it has an error.....
plz help me guys
